name: Forest Fall Frenzy (Jay Bretherton)
description:
Forest Fall Frenzy is a game in which the player controls a tree defending its patch from deforesters who are making their way around the forest to slay their kin. Tutorial - Press play on the main menu - WASD to Move the Camera and mouse/trackpad for moving around and clicking to attack deforesters. - Abilities can be selected by clicking them or pressing the apparent number.

Made for Global Game Jam 2023.

Credits: 

- Gordon Bicker
- Katya Dix
- Riley McNeil
- Alena Barr
- James McDade
- Ethan Nicholson
- Jay Bretherton

GGJ Site: https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/forest-fall-frenzy-5
